errors.symptom: User confused by UI display showing full URI instead of just 'abstract' label after adding property
errors.trigger: Adding abstract property and seeing unexpected UI rendering with full dcterms:abstract display

errors.symptom: User cannot see difference between 'text' and 'textarea' input types during testing
errors.trigger: Changing input type from textarea to text to test visual difference

errors.symptom: Abstract field disappears when user changes input type from textarea to text
errors.trigger: Modifying display rule input type configuration

errors.symptom: User realizes they made mistake in display rule configuration causing field to disappear
errors.trigger: Observing that abstract field is no longer visible after input type change

errors.symptom: User uncertain about display order configuration and whether positioning under title works as expected
errors.trigger: Placing abstract display rule under title property in YAML configuration

errors.symptom: User expresses uncertainty about input type documentation and correct values
errors.trigger: Looking up proper input type values for textarea vs text

errors.symptom: User expects primary source configuration to persist but system doesn't retain previous setting
errors.trigger: Saving changes and expecting previously specified primary source to remain selected
